ja546:20.2: Yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā;
ja546:92.4: Na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñci”.
ja546:97.4: So me jito taṃ me avākarohi”.
ja546:98.1: “Attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca,
ja546:98.2: Dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca;
ja546:103.3: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño,
ja546:129.4: Mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo;
ja546:185.2: Atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu;
ja546:186.4: Na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāhaṃ”.
ja546:216.4: Bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci.
ja546:225.2: Hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
ja546:228.2: Hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
ja546:230.3: Asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho,
ja546:235.3: Asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho,
ja546:261.1: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
ja546:281.2: Na sayaṃ kataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
ja546:285.1: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
ja546:308.3: Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho,
ja546:311.3: Atthe ca dhamme ca ṭhito nipāko,
ja546:314.1: Ye keci baddhā mama atthi raṭṭhe,
